General.Name: Shanghai ZJ Bio-Tech Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai ZJ Bio-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of molecular genetic diagnostic reagents, and instruments and equipment in China. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, China.
